set(THIS_PROJECT CryMovie)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_Nodes
	AnimCameraNode.cpp
	AnimCameraNode.h
	AnimEnvironmentNode.cpp
	AnimEnvironmentNode.h
	AnimGeomCacheNode.cpp
	AnimGeomCacheNode.h
	AnimLightNode.cpp
	AnimLightNode.h
	AnimNode.cpp
	AnimNode.h
	AnimPostFXNode.cpp
	AnimPostFXNode.h
	AnimScreenFaderNode.cpp
	AnimScreenFaderNode.h
	CVarNode.cpp
	CVarNode.h
	CommentNode.cpp
	CommentNode.h
	CryMovie.h
	EntityNode.cpp
	EntityNode.h
	EventNode.cpp
	EventNode.h
	LayerNode.cpp
	LayerNode.h
	MaterialNode.cpp
	MaterialNode.h
	SceneNode.cpp
	SceneNode.h
	ScriptVarNode.cpp
	ScriptVarNode.h
	ShadowsSetupNode.cpp
	ShadowsSetupNode.h
)
source_group("Nodes" FILES ${SourceGroup_Nodes})


set (SourceGroup_Root
	StdAfx.cpp
	resource.h
)
source_group("Root" FILES ${SourceGroup_Root})


set (SourceGroup_SourceFiles
	2DSpline.h
	AnimSequence.cpp
	AnimSequence.h
	CryMovie.cpp
	Movie.cpp
	Movie.h
	StdAfx.h
	StdAfx.cpp
	TCBSpline.h
)
source_group("Source Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles})


set (SourceGroup_Tracks
	AnimSplineTrack.cpp
	AnimSplineTrack.h
	AnimSplineTrack_FloatSpecialization.h
	AnimSplineTrack_QuatSpecialization.h
	AnimSplineTrack_Vec2Specialization.h
	AnimSplineTrack_Vec3Specialization.h
	AnimTrack.cpp
	AnimTrack.h
	BoolTrack.cpp
	BoolTrack.h
	CaptureTrack.cpp
	CaptureTrack.h
	CharacterTrack.cpp
	CharacterTrack.h
	CommentTrack.cpp
	CommentTrack.h
	CompoundSplineTrack.cpp
	CompoundSplineTrack.h
	ConsoleTrack.cpp
	ConsoleTrack.h
	EventTrack.cpp
	EventTrack.h
	ExprTrack.cpp
	ExprTrack.h
	FaceSeqTrack.cpp
	FaceSeqTrack.h
	GotoTrack.cpp
	GotoTrack.h
	LookAtTrack.cpp
	LookAtTrack.h
	MannequinTrack.cpp
	MannequinTrack.h
	MusicTrack.cpp
	MusicTrack.h
	ScreenFaderTrack.cpp
	ScreenFaderTrack.h
	SelectTrack.cpp
	SelectTrack.h
	SequenceTrack.cpp
	SequenceTrack.h
	SoundTrack.cpp
	SoundTrack.h
	TimeRangesTrack.cpp
	TimeRangesTrack.h
	TrackEventTrack.cpp
	TrackEventTrack.h
)
source_group("Tracks" FILES ${SourceGroup_Tracks})


# Support unity build with uber files
set(CryMovie_uber_0_cpp ${SourceGroup_Root} ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles}  )
enable_unity_build( "CryMovie_uber_0.cpp" CryMovie_uber_0_cpp )

set(CryMovie_uber_1_cpp ${SourceGroup_Nodes} ${SourceGroup_Tracks}  )
enable_unity_build( "CryMovie_uber_1.cpp" CryMovie_uber_1_cpp )

set(NoUberFile  )


set (SOURCES
	${CryMovie_uber_0_cpp}
	${CryMovie_uber_1_cpp}
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST


include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SOURCES})

USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "StdAfx.h" "StdAfx.cpp" )

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
